article_title: UCLA study finds more Californians are obese, diabetic

article_metadata.news-keywords: UCLA, health survey, UCLA Center for Health Policy Research, Susan Babey, Ninez Ponce
article_metadata.description: California adults are heftier, eating more fast food and getting diagnosed with diabetes at higher rates. And California kids? They’re spending an “astounding” amount of time sitting glued to a TV, computer or phone screen.
article_metadata.title: UCLA study finds more Californians are obese, diabetic | The Sacramento Bee
